alert.note: Alert for Zion National Park (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued November 13 at 1:12PM MST until November 14 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 25 expected. * WHERE...Zion National Park including Springdale, Rockville and Virgin. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 8 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
